name: 1BandArmy
description:
In this game, you'll have to hit the right key to the rhythm of the music. In each level, you'll encounter new characters that will join you on your journey to become a rockstar.

Use arrow keys to navigate and space bar to select options in the menu (or skip dialog text)

Advice: use your left ring finger for the "A" key, the middle finger for the "S", the pointing finger for the "D", the right-pointing finger for the "F" and the right-middle finger for the "G" key.
